title.narrative: 1.3. JUSTICE AND PROTECTION FOR CHILDREN

description.narrative: By 2021, the capacity of the State to improve protection mechanisms and justice for children and adolescents who are victims of violence, exploitation or family abandonment and in conflict with penal law will have been built., which contributes to Child Protection And Emergencies, Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Data And Child Protection, Human Rights Institutions, Justice For Children, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect (Covid), Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, children and adolescents will be brought up and educated without violence and will access services that guarantee their protection and access to justice

title.narrative: By 2021, the capacity of the State to improve protection mechanisms and justice for children and adolescents who are victims ofviolence, exploitation or family abandonment and in conflict with penal law will have been built.

description.narrative: UNICEF;made a steady progress;towards;professionalization of child protection workforce;by implementing;online and institutionalized;capacity;building;initiatives;and development of key occupational instruments;related to child protection for;MIMP and National Immigration Authority.;;The socio-educational model of intervention for adolescent in conflict in the law in;deprivation of liberty setting which;addresses the issue of sexual crimes and attention for victims for sexual violence is developed in;Peru.;; | Status:Met | As-of Date:17/12/2021
